flawed_nl_solution:
In the first week, Jed has 20 + 6 = <<20+6=62>>62 cards.
In the second week, he has 62 + 6 = <<62+6=68>>68 cards.
But he is left with 68 - 2 = <<68-2=66>>66 cards on the 2nd week after giving 2 cards to his friend.
Then Jed has 66 + 6 = <<66+6=72>>72 cards on the 3rd week.
He has 72 + 6 = <<72+6=78>>78 cards on the 4th week.
After giving his friend 2 cards, he is then left with 78 - 2 = <<78-2=76>>76 cards on the 4th week.
#### 4

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 26, not 62. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
